## Summer Flounder

Below you'll find a number of visualization of varying data sets all aimed to describe the changes in the ecology and fishery of Summer flounder, *Paralichthys dentatus*. The data behind these visualizations span a number of states, agencies, and confidentiality restrictions. For more information regarding the origin of this information, please contact [clovas\@gmri.org](mailto:clovas@gmri.org).

```{r}
#| label: libraries and paths
#| echo: false

library(tidyverse)

box_path <- "/Users/clovas/Library/CloudStorage/Box-Box/Mills Lab/Projects/"
mafmc_metrics <- paste0(box_path, "MAFMC_SpeciesShifts/Species_Shift_Metrics/")
fed_fishery   <- paste0(mafmc_metrics, "Federal_Fishery_Independent/")
state_fishery <- paste0(mafmc_metrics, "State_Fishery_Independent/")
fishery_dep   <- paste0(mafmc_metrics, "Fishery_Dependent/")
```

### NMFS Northeast Fisheries Science Center Spring-Fall Bottom Trawl

```{r}
#| label: trawl
knitr::include_graphics(here::here("data","summerflounder.png"))
```

```{r}

```
